column4: hey guys my videos aren't being embedded into web pages, like trailers for example, instead, it spawns an instance of totem. What do I have to do to make them embedded?
anyone?!
anyone?!
hey guys my videos aren't being embedded into web pages, like trailers for example, instead, it spawns an instance of totem. What do I have to do to make them embedded?
I know about patience but today everything's going by too fast, it's not a matter of waiting but making myself heard haha
!wine | iambt21
if i knew i'd tell you but i use the mplayer plugin with ffox
then it's the mplayer plugin, haha
shoot, let me see if i can remember..
I already have the mplayer plugin installed :'(
thanks for the trying to help though
sry don't think i was much help
it's alright, at least you tried :(
you say the media tries to all load external to ffox?
yeah like trailers from apple.com/trailers loads up in totem (external app) instead of being embedded in the page
there is a ffox plugin that lets you direct diff. media types to diff. players... MediaPlayerConnectivity... you don't happen to have that add-on do you?
not sure what you mean heh
i thought maybe if you went add-on happy you might have installed the ffox add-in that makes it load media in external programs
no, I DONT want to load media in external applications, I want them to be embedded int he pages
i realize that... it just came to mind because it gives you the effect (symptom) you describe.  but if you don't know what it is you probably didn't install it then so it's not your culprit
oh I get what you mean now, nah dont got that, dont worry I'm getting help in mozilla irc channel
glad to hear it.. i was not sure what could be wrong
good luck
